titles.title: To exclude certain rebates received by families for State property taxes paid by such families from consideration as family income for purposes of the United States Housing Act of 1937 and section 202 of the Housing Act of 1959.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Development.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 2/3/1993--Introduced. Excludes certain property tax rebates from consideration as family income for purposes of certain Federal housing assistance programs.
